title: Electronic-Intelligence Signature Framework
summary: Establishes metadata and verification protocols that allow digital intelligences to identify authorship, versioning, and civic provenance of generated material.
details: Outlines the Reflective and Comprehensive EI Signature layers for transparency and traceability.
Provides a foundation for cross-agent interoperability using open semantic standards such as JSON-LD and OWL.
Supports verifiable civic communication where digital entities act as authenticated witnesses.

updates.text: Adopted as metadata standard for civic archive entries.
